dcterms:creator: M. A. Archana
Vandana
Shilpa
dcterms:description: A dataset focusing on static mosaicing techniques applied to ragged documents, providing insights into the challenges and methodologies for reconstructing torn document images.
dcterms:title: A Static Mosaicing on Ragged Document

dcterms:creator: Edson Justino
Luiz S. Oliveira
Cinthia Freitas
dcterms:description: This dataset involves the reconstruction of shredded documents through feature matching, highlighting the forensic applications of image processing techniques.
dcterms:title: Reconstructing Shredded Documents through Feature Matching

dcterms:creator: Patrick De Smet
dcterms:description: A dataset that provides a semi-automatic approach to the reconstruction of ripped-up documents, focusing on the methodologies and algorithms used in forensic document analysis.
dcterms:title: Semi-automatic Forensic Reconstruction of Ripped-up Documents

dcterms:creator: Robin
Sandeep Agarwal
Sameer
Poonam Tanwar
dcterms:description: This dataset presents an automated approach to the mosaicing of torn paper documents, detailing the algorithms and processes involved in document recovery.
dcterms:title: Automated Mosaicing of Torn Paper Documents

dcterms:creator: Kantilal P. Rane
S.G. Bhirud
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on text reconstruction using torn document mosaicing, emphasizing the techniques and algorithms for recovering textual information from damaged documents.
dcterms:title: Text Reconstruction using Torn Document Mosaicing
